text: Theory of Love () is a 2019 Thai television series starring Atthaphan Phunsawat (Gun) and Jumpol Adulkittiporn (Off). Directed by Nuttapong Mongkolsawas and produced by GMMTV, the series was one of the thirteen television series for 2019 launched by GMMTV in their "Wonder Th13teen" event last 5 November 2018. It premiered on GMM 25 and LINE TV on 1 June 2019, airing on Saturdays at 21:25 ICT and 23:00 ICT, respectively. The series concluded on 17 August 2019. == Cast and characters == Below are the cast of the series: === Main === * Atthaphan Phunsawat (Gun) as Third * Jumpol Adulkittiporn (Off) as Khai === Supporting === * Nawat Phumphotingam (White) as Two * Chinnarat Siriphongchawalit (Mike) as Bone * Pirapat Watthanasetsiri (Earth) as Aun * Sara Legge as Paan * Neen Suwanamas as Lyn * Patara Eksangkul (Foei) as Chaine * Supakan Benjaarruk (Nok) as Ching Ching * Latkamon Pinrojkirati (Pim) === Guest role === * Alysaya Tsoi (Alice) (Ep. 1) * Benjamin Joseph Varney as Ton (Ep. 6-7) * Thanaboon Wanlopsirinun (Na) as Gab, Paan's Boyfriend (Ep. 8-9, 11-12) * Jiratpisit Jaravijit (Boom) as a boy in the bar (Ep. 11) * Sutthipha Kongnawdee (Noon) as Bone's girlfriend (Ep. 12) * Sureeyaret Yakaret (Prigkhing) as Fahsai * Patnicha Kulasingh (Plai) as Nong Som * Kris Songsamphant as an actor auditioning for the play (Ep. 7) == Soundtrack == {| class="wikitable" !Song Title !Romanized Title !Artist ! |- | พระเอกจำลอง | Pra Ake Jum Long | Getsunova | style="text-align: center;" | |} == Awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Award Ceremony !Category !Recipient(s) !Result ! |- | rowspan="2" | 2020 | rowspan="2" | LINE TV Awards | Best Couple | Atthaphan Phunsawat (Gun) Jumpol Adulkittiporn (Off) | | rowspan="2" | |- |Most Hearted Content of the Year |Theory of Love | |} == International broadcast == * – On 28 September 2020, announced that it had acquired distribution rights of three television series from GMMTV which included the said series. It is scheduled to be distributed locally in Japanese subtitles by early 2021. * – Dreamscape Entertainment announced on 10 September 2020, that it had acquired distribution rights of five television series from GMMTV which included the said series and will be made available for streaming on iWantTFC. == References == == External links == * Theory of Love on GMM 25 website * Theory of Love on LINE TV * * GMMTV Category:Television series by GMMTV Category:Thai boys' love television series Category:Thai romantic comedy television series Category:2019 Thai television series debuts Category:2019 Thai television series endings Category:GMM 25 original programming Category:2010s LGBT- related comedy television series
title: Theory of Love (TV series)
